S

selectHeroes() - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.InitTeams
This function is used to give the user the choice of heros for the game , the function also throws a unique exception IlllegalEntryException if the user chooses the same hero.

stageRevive() - Method in class ProjectGameVer3.Hero
This function revives fainted heros to 25% of the health and gives all active heroes full health.
StoryLine - Class in ProjectGameVer3
 
StoryLine() - Constructor for class ProjectGameVer3.StoryLine
Empty default constructor.It can be used to initialize a StoryLine class to generate help display.

This initializes the the StoryLine using a team of heros.
